CustomField.description: This is the question that is the branching question. Note, the related question MUST have "Is Branching Question" equal to true, to allow this record to be created.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is the question that is the branching question. Note, the related question MUST have "Is Branching Question" equal to true, to allow this record to be created.
CustomField.label: Application Question

lookupFilter.errorMessage: Related question must be a branching question.
